dust.tool_link_network: Cannot be Linked to Another Network
item.dust.tool_linkingtool.description: Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect) Links from the Receiver to the Sender
item.dust.tool_linkingtoolbackwards.desc: Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect) Links from the Sender to the Receiver
item.dust.tool_upgradetool.description: Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrades, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.dust.tool_filtertool.description: Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrades, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.dust.tool_tagtool.description: Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
item.dust.tool_devtool.description: Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Break Pedestals if in Creative Mode
item.dust.filter_base.base_description: THIS FILTER BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
item.dust.filter_base.description: All other Filters: Crouch Right Click on a Chest to Set the Contents as the Filter, Craft to Clear Filter
item.dust.filter_base.description_use: Offhand Filter and Right Click to Insert the Filter In Pedestal.
item.dust.filter_item.description_use: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_itemstack.description_u: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_durability.description: This Filter Filters By Item Durability
item.dust.filter_durability.description_: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_enchanted.description_u: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_enchantedcount.descript: This Filter Filters By Enchants on an Item
Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES
item.dust.filter_enchantedexact.descript: This Filter Filters By Enchant Names on Items
Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_enchantedfuzzy.descript: This Filter Filters By Specific Enchants on Items
Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_food.description: This Filter Filters out Items the Game Considers Food
item.dust.filter_food.description_use: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_mod.description: This Filter Filters By Items From the Same Mod
item.dust.filter_mod.description_use: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_restricted.description: This Filter Restricts How Many Items a Pedestal Can Hold
item.dust.filter_restricted.description_: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.filter_tag.description: This Filter Filters By The Tags on an Item (Items in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
item.dust.filter_tag.description_use: Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
item.dust.augment_pedestal_nocollide.des: Prevents onCollision Pedestal Effects. Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground while paper collides with an animal.
Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground while paper collides with an animal.
item.dust.augment_pedestal_roundrobin.de: Makes the Pedestal Transfer 'Round Robin'. Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper and parrots.
Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper and parrots.
item.dust.augment_pedestal_renderdiffuse: Disables Particles and Item/Upgrade Render on Pedestals.
Offhand Item, Crouch Right Click in Air to Toggle
Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper when its raining.
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_base.base_des: THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_base.descript: All Other Upgrades: Offhand Upgrade and Crouch Right Click to switch MODES, Offhand Upgrade and Right Click to Insert Into Pedestal
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_import.descri: Imports from 'Below' Inventory into the Pedestal at a rate of 4 items/ 2 Buckets/ 1000rf/ 10 Levels a second.
item.dust.upgrade_pedestal_export.descri: Exports from Pedestal into the Inventory 'Below' at a rate of 4 items/ 2 Buckets/ 1000rf/ 10 Levels a second.
item.dust.item_crystal.description: Obtained from Breaking Clusters of Crystals in Geodes
item.dust.applicator.description: Crouch Right Click to Save Color, Right Click to Apply Color, Offhand and Any Placed Crystal Stone Blocks will Place with Current Color.
block.dust.block_inertnode.description: Over time: Generates Clusters Of Crystals, or Converts Stone into Colored Crystal Stone
block.dust.block_inertcluster_full.descr: A Full Sized Cluster of Crystals
block.dust.block_crystal_stone.descripti: Made from Converting Stone with a Crystal Node, used in Crafting/Building - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_crystal_stone_slab.desc: Used in Crafting/Building - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_crystal_stone_stair.des: Used in Crafting/Building - Can be Recolored with Applicator
block.dust.block_pedestal.description: Can Transport Items, Fluids, Energy, and XP, Drop Speed and Slowness Potions on it for Special Effects - Can be Recolored with Applicator
